code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec find_value_of_partition(nums :: [integer]) :: integer
  def find_value_of_partition(nums) do
    sorted = Enum.sort(nums)
    min_diffs = for i <- 1..(length(sorted)-1), do: abs(sorted[i-1] - sorted[i])
    Enum.min(min_diffs)
  end
end
